prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that floats with a mystical lantern-like appearance.
I want a spooky Pokemon that looks like a lamp and has an eerie glow.
Generate a creature inspired by lanterns, with haunting eyes and a ghostly aura.
Make a whimsical ghost-type Pokemon with a black top hat and glowing blue flames.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends light and shadow, showcasing a lantern's charm.
Design a ghostly figure that represents lost spirits, glowing softly in the dark.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a street lamp, but has a mystical and eerie vibe.
